StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetPhaselineObjec.ves]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Recrui.ngOrgID as integer, @FiscalYear as integer, @Month as integer AS
SELECT PHASELINE_ID, ORGANIZATION_ID AS Recrui.ngOrgID, FISCAL_YEAR AS FiscalYear, MONTH As MonthCode, ISNULL(ATTAIN_PERCENT, 0) AS ATTAIN_PERCENT, START_DATE, END_DATE FROM [dbo].[PHASELINE_OBJECTIVE] WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @Recrui.ngOrgID AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [MONTH] = @Month ORDER BY START_DATE
